item.title: Startup Metrics for Pirates (SeedCamp 2008)
item.description: If you're in a Startup you need to agree quite quickly on some of those performance metrics and here, Dave McClure shares his view.

item.title: HOW TO use Twitter for your startup
item.description: Twitter is a very powerful tool for any startup and I believe it is the first social network any would be entrepreneur needs to setup when launching their new business.

item.title: Management lessons we can learn from films - TRON
item.description: TRON is still a superb film, I was too young when it was first issued, but watching it recently started me thinking about business strategy and business models for startups.

item.title: Apple Mac App Store an imperfect tool for small apps developers?
item.description: Apple's new Mac App Store arrives on January 6 and it could be the perfect tool for small app developers and a welcome boost in hybrid web-app startups.

item.title: What's your business model?
item.description: I was having a catchup with a go0d friend this evening and he reminded me that every startup or or new venture needs to solve a problem.

item.title: Happy Saturday Humour - What are you like when you pitch?
item.description: Hope you're having a good weekend so far! How do you think people perceive your communication skills?

item.title: Task Management with Post-It Notes
item.description: As I'm a certified Scrum Master and very good at project and task management I can say I enjoy running planning sessions with teams I do work with.

item.title: Cambridge Startup Weekend Dec 10 - 12
item.description: Cambridge Startup Weekend is coming - and I mean Cambridge, UK.

item.title: Essential Startup Resources for Customer Relationship Management
item.description: So here is an essential collection of startup resources to customer relationship management or CRM.
